minecraft:block_culling_rules.title: resource.block_culling_rules
minecraft:block_culling_rules.description: JSON container used for descriptions, especially the identifier for the name of the culled version of the block..

description.description: Contains the identifier used by minecraft:geometry block components to refer to this culling data

rules.description: List of all components used to identify geometry parts used in culling.

geometry_part.description: Specifies the bone, cube, and face that the block will be culled. The cube and face fields are optional to allow culling a specific face. Omitting these fields will cull the whole bone.

direction.description: Specifies the direction of the neighbor block to check for culling. This direction rotates with a block's Transform component.
